replies.body:
I just got Zoe the other day she is really difficult to play and under powered honestly. Most of the strong mid lane mages are all faceroll by comparison and deserve more hate. She feels like a hardcore mode version of EZ to play not the mid lane button mash erase you mages and if someone is wrecking you with her you are probably being badly outskilled. That Irelia nerf though. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Full Brain,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RbLyizgq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-25T20:01:46.228+0000)
>
>  Most of the strong mid lane mages are all faceroll by comparison and deserve more hate. 

{{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:134}}{{champion:99}} 
**Cough***Fucking***Cough**

Don't get me started on assassins...
She should be buffed massively but remove some of her passive such as free summoner spells and actives....

Wanna hear a joke?

Minus 5 movement speed on a Champion with a self-refreshing point-and-click dash

> Minus 5 movement speed on a Champion with a self-refreshing point-and-click dash

Wanna hear another joke?

-3 Base AD.

Pfft, weak. Try something more like Malzahar rework.
